com.example.habitapp.utils.recyclerview

Class FriendRequestAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<FriendRequestViewHolder>
      • com.example.habitapp.utils.recyclerview.FriendRequestAdapter

  • public class FriendRequestAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<FriendRequestViewHolder>
    The FriendRequestAdapter is the adapter class for the FriendRequestRecyclerView, it holds the requests that the recycler view displays as well as some other functionality.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FriendRequestAdapter.OnFriendRequestListener
      An interface which specifies that all classes which use this class must have a certain behaviour.
